'''Jago Boffin''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Jago was the eldest child of [[Hugo Boffin]] and [[Donnamira Took]]. He had one son, [[Vigo Boffin]].<ref>{{App|Boffin}}</ref>
